hero.title: Share your side projects
hero.subtitle: Connect with creators, showcase your side projects, and compete for monthly prizes.

mission.title: Why Krí1.is

problem1.title: Provide exposure to creators
problem1.description: Many talented developers are building valuable projects, but they lack a platform to showcase their work and gain recognition.

problem2.title: Provide Oxygen to Projects
problem2.description: Many projects never see the light of day due to lack of motivation, recognition, or community support.

problem3.title: Find Opportunities for Collaboration
problem3.description: We want to foster a culture of collaboration, where creators can easily connect to share experiences and use one another's skills and projects.

problem4.title: Build for the future
problem4.description: AI will mean there is an explosion of new projects and ideas. We need a way to surface the best ones and help Iceland benefit from this wave of innovation.

mission.value: Krí1.is connects Iceland's creators, makes knowledge transparent, and helps identify opportunities to strengthen Icelandic society.

valueProps.title: Build. Showcase. Win.
valueProps.subtitle: Join Iceland's community of builders

visibility.title: Visibility for Your Projects
visibility.description: Get featured in our community and compete for monthly prizes. Your work deserves recognition.

connect.title: Connect with Fellow Builders
connect.description: Find collaborators and learn from Iceland's tech community. Share your expertise and discover new opportunities.

impact.title: Contribute to Iceland's Growth
impact.description: Build projects that strengthen our society. Make a meaningful impact on Iceland.

valueProps.prizeCallout: Every month, outstanding projects are highlighted and rewarded. Your side project could be next.

step1.title: Submit Your Project
step1.description: Share your side project with details about what makes it special and how it helps Iceland.

step2.title: Showcase to Community
step2.description: Your project becomes visible to Iceland's tech community once approved.

step3.title: Compete for Monthly Prize
step3.description: Outstanding projects are featured and highlighted each month.

step4.title: Gain Recognition
step4.description: Build your reputation, attract collaborators, and make an impact.

monthlyPrize.title: This Month's Prize
monthlyPrize.subtitle: Recognition for Iceland's builders
monthlyPrize.placeholderDescription: When projects arrive, the community votes and creators win recognition and prizes. Be among the first to submit your project.
monthlyPrize.comingSoon: First projects will be featured soon

cta.title: Ready to be Featured?
cta.subtitle: Submit your project and compete for this month's prize. Join Iceland's community of builders.

projects.title: Browse Projects
projects.subtitle: Discover amazing projects from our developer community
projects.noProjectsSubtitle: Try adjusting your search criteria or filters

projectDetail.notFoundSubtitle: The project you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.

submit.title: Submit Your Project
submit.subtitle: Share your amazing project with our community. All submissions go through a review process.
submit.shortDescriptionPlaceholder: Brief description of your project (max 500 characters)
submit.detailedDescriptionPlaceholder: Detailed description of your project, its features, and how it works...
submit.atLeastOneTech: At least one technology is required
submit.atLeastOneCategory: At least one category is required
guidelinesList: Projects must be original work or have proper attribution
Include clear screenshots or demos of your project
Provide a working website or demo URL
Write a detailed description explaining what your project does
All submissions are reviewed before being published
